name: switch-game-play-history
title: Switch Game Play History
description: Browse your Nintendo Switch gameplay history. Including information such as first played time, last played time, and total playtime for each game.
author: kvdo2

commands.name: recentPlayHistories
commands.title: Browse Recent
commands.description: Browse play history from the past week.

preferences.name: NINTENDO_SESSION_TOKEN
preferences.title: Nintendo Session Token
preferences.description: It is used to fetch the game history. Please run `Get Session Token` command for the first time.

preferences.name: GAME_TITLE_LANGUAGE_CODE
preferences.title: Game Title Language (Beta)
preferences.description: Game title language depends on your Nintendo accout region. If you choose English, the English game title will be displayed as much as possible. For games that cannot be obtained, the original title is displayed.

preferences.name: SYNC_TO_NOTION
preferences.title: Sync to Notion (Beta)
preferences.description: Sync your play history to Notion.If you want to use this feature, please set `Notion API Key` and `Notion Database ID`.
preferences.label: Enabled

preferences.name: NOTION_DATABASE_ID
preferences.title: Notion Database ID
preferences.description: It is used to store play history data.
